alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 13 at 5:30PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected with blowing snow and near blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Wind gusts up to 60 to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Gila Region and Sacramento mountains. * WHEN...11 PM MST Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Falling snow and strong winds will combine to produce low visibilities and very difficult travel, especially along US- 82, US-70, NM-152, and NM-15.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
